predicate.note: Frames file for 'quash' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Yes, it actually occurs more than once. Variant of 'squash'. Verbnet entries carve-21.2-1 funnel-9.3 knead-26.5; other framed members include: push (variant), wind.

example.name: no arg2
example.text: UAL Corp.'s board quashed any prospects for an immediate revival of a labor-management buy-out, saying United Airlines' parent should remain independent for now.
example.arg: any prospects for an immediate revival of a labor-management buy-out
saying United Airlines' parent should remain independent for now
